title: Deqing Urban Hotel near Verdant Tashan Forest Park
description: In the heart of a city known for nearby natural landscapes, Crowne Plaza Deqing Moganshan, an IHG Hotel, offers modern comforts against the backdrop of the lush wetlands. Youâ€™ll be spoilt for choice with outdoor action aplenty - from the bamboo forests of Mount Mogan, to the stunning Xiazhu Wetland Park. Soothe your muscles at the oasis-like indoor swimming pool, complete with a glass rooftop, or enjoy some tom yum goong soup - the speciality at the onsite Bangkok Restaurant.
